mapper.select: select * from house h join homedetails hd on h.homedid=hd.homedid join homephoto hp on h.hpid=hp.hpid join customers c on h.hid=c.cid where hd.homedid=1

select * from house hou LEFT JOIN customers cus on hou.cid=cus.cid LEFT JOIN homedetails h on hou.homedid=h.homedid LEFT JOIN provinces p on h.provinceId=p.provinceid LEFT JOIN cities c on c.cityid=h.cityid LEFT JOIN areas a on a.areaid=h.areaid LEFT JOIN housetype ht on ht.houseTypeId=h.houseTypeId LEFT JOIN rent r on r.rentid=h.rentid LEFT JOIN apartments ap on ap.Apartmentsid=h.Apartmentsid LEFT JOIN toilettype t on t.toiletTypeId=h.toiletTypeId LEFT JOIN pricerule pri on hou.pruleId=pri.pruleId LEFT JOIN homephoto photo on hou.hpid=photo.hpid join bed b on b.bedid=h.bedid join bedtype bt on bt.bedTypeId=b.bedTypeId
